title: More Pool Party Skins Riot Please?
body: If you look at Pool Party Ziggs Splash Art you can see there Garen,Katarina,Darius,Ahri,Nidalee and I think Yorick behind Katarina.You can see Leona Renekton aswell.The other 2 women I don't know who they are.Maybe Riven and Diana. In the Pool Party Loading Screen you can see Vayne,Jinx (its like you see from her perspective),Ahri and Morgana.In Pool Party Renekton Splash Art you can see Ahri and Gragas.Also Ziggs.In Pool Party Lee Sin you can see Orianna and Nidalee.In Pool Party Leona Splash Art you can see Ezreal and old Taric.In Pool Party Graves Splash Art you can also see again Katarina,Garen and Darius.Yeah guys this is all.I would LOVE to see all these skins in League of Legends.

replies.body: the skin i most want is a pool party bard skin.  Hawaiian shirt, sunglasses, shorts, and collects beers.
There should be another set of 5 Pool Party skins sometime this summer. Judging by last year though, they may not be any of the champions teased in the first set of Pool Party splashes.
You are right. I missed some of them sorry.Thanks Zarvanis!

Jinx {{champion:222}}  on the Pool Party Graves {{champion:104}} splash is especially difficult to see if you don't already know she's there. It's just her head poking out slightly from behind the diving board tower Aatrox {{champion:266}}  is on.
Im pretty sure thats Nidalee {{champion:76}} not Xin Zhao {{champion:5}}

I'm fairly certain it's Xin {{champion:5}}. 

1. The figure is too broad and muscular. Nidalee is much more slender.
2. Nidalee's skin-tone is much darker.
3. There aren't any white marks (as seen on the Pool Party Lee splash art)
2. They're wearing swim trunks, and no top.
But wheres Jinx in Pool Party Graves
I just want a pool party Braum
i want braum and taric to have a matching skin, pool party or otherwise.
Dear lord no. This skin line is so annoying, money wasting and I won't even mention the Q sound of PP Draven.
